collectible.title: Warp Key
collectible.subtitle: The source of her power
collectible.text: A mysterious object the size of a large coin, capable of storing tremendous amounts of the cosmic energy Supernova uses to teleport. She keeps it on a necklace around her neck at all times.

collectible.title: Lewd Portal Tricks
collectible.subtitle: Now you're thinking with portals!
collectible.text: "How it felt? It felt... weird. I could feel my hands on top of my head while they were halfway down my body, and my own tongue pressing against my... my private parts, from both sides, and the... the smell of everything, and the liquid and... Ooh, just thinking about it makes me... makes me feel... Why do I want to do it again now?"
collectible.unlock:
Have Supernova eat herself out using portals.
(Hint: Play with Emi or Jessie)
